Social And Cultural Activities: Initiated the purchase of Morbe Dam which is drinking water boon for Navi Mumbai; establishment of Navi Mumbai Municipal Corporation (NMMC); NMMC awarded the 1st prize in the First Sant Gadgebaba Cleanliness Drive State-2002, Government of Maharashtra
Favourite Pastime and Recreation: Long drive, electronic gadgets, magazines and networking
Educational Qualifications: Intermediate Educated at Mumbai University, Maharashtra
Other Information: Contributed to the (i) Sewage Treatment Plant (STP); (ii) Valmiki Ambedkar Rehabilitation Project; (iii) Solid Waste Management Programme; (iv) Initiative for water charges & property tax to remain same for next 20 years; (v) C.B.D. Belapur Sports Stadium; and (vi) Akhil Bhartiya Natya Parishad
